reviews.review: Dr. Smith is an amazing professor who explains everything clearly.

reviews.review: Good professor, but the exams are really tough.

reviews.review: Lectures are decent, but could be more engaging.

reviews.review: Super passionate about the subject and very approachable.

reviews.review: Hard to follow, and not very responsive to emails.

reviews.review: Insightful and provides great feedback on essays.

reviews.review: One of the best teachers I've had. His exams are fair.

reviews.review: Interesting material but can be a bit confusing at times.

reviews.review: Terrible at explaining concepts and exams are unfair.

reviews.review: Good professor, but a lot of reading assignments.

reviews.review: Knowledgeable, but often goes off on tangents.

reviews.review: Incredibly enthusiastic and really makes the class fun.

reviews.review: Not very engaging, and the lectures are often boring.

reviews.review: Helpful in office hours, but the material is difficult.

reviews.review: Excellent professor with real-world experience. Highly recommend.

reviews.review: Interesting content, but the lectures are a bit dry.

reviews.review: Passionate about the environment and it shows in her teaching.

reviews.review: Unorganized and never on time. Would not recommend.
